import React, { Component } from 'react' import { getUserDetails } from './UserFunctions' class SecurityQuestions extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { 'answer1':'', 'answer2':'', email: '', password: '', role: 'student', errors: [] } this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this) // this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } componentDidMount() { } render() { const { errors } = this.state; return (

Security Questions

{errors.role && {errors.role}}
{errors.role && {errors.role}}
{errors.role && {errors.role}}

Error on Page: {error}

))}
) } } export default SecurityQuestions
